mapper.select: SELECT ss.store_id, ss.store_cus_id, COALESCE ( SUM( CASE WHEN ssd.sale_type = 1 THEN ssd.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0 ) AS saleAmount, COALESCE ( SUM( CASE WHEN ssd.sale_type = 2 THEN ssd.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0 ) AS returnAmount, COALESCE ( SUM( CASE WHEN ssd.sale_type = 1 THEN ssd.quantity ELSE 0 END ), 0 ) AS saleNum, COALESCE ( SUM( CASE WHEN ssd.sale_type = 2 THEN ssd.quantity ELSE 0 END ), 0 ) AS returnNum FROM store_sale ss LEFT JOIN store_sale_detail ssd ON ss.id = ssd.store_sale_id WHERE ss.del_flag = 0 AND ss.voucher_date = #{voucherDate} GROUP BY ss.store_id, ss.store_cus_id
